items.sentence: The police compared the fingerprints on the gun with those on the door.
There is an urgent need for more people to donate their time and money.
Tom and Mary plan to get married as soon as they graduate from college.
Tom and Mary saw themselves in the mirror that was hanging on the wall.
I don\'t enjoy teaching children to swim when their parents are around.
I don\'t often eat in restaurants with pictures of food on their menus.
I think I understood everything Tom said, but I\'m not absolutely sure.
I can\'t stop you from revealing my secrets. However, I beg you not to.
I\'d like to thank you for helping me translate the report into French.
Mr. Jackson is in the hospital, so I\'ll be teaching his classes today.
